tasks.label: Dev Services: Up + DB Init (arm64 override)
tasks.command: docker compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.override.arm64.yml up -d --build postgres mongodb formio && docker compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.override.arm64.yml --profile db-init run --rm backend-db-init
